hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
#!/bin/ksh
VERSION=`ssh tcserver@dvappdai01 "grep Implementation-Version /opt/tcserver/instances/billing/webapps/dai-billing/META-INF/MANIFEST.MF | cut -d : -f 2 | tr -d ' ' | tr -d '\r'"`
print Gathering build version to be deployed print -------------------------------------- print print Deploying version ${VERSION} print print
cd /opt/checkouts/oss_deployment/scripts
print ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------ print ./deploy.sh -a dai-billing -t dai-billing -e 10.13.18.116 -i billing -r ${VERSION} -j "jdbc:oracle:thin:@10.13.18.120:1522:scrum002" -p SC2_BILLING -u SC2_BILLING -v
echo "dai-billing-${VERSION}" > /var/www/html/scrum2/bill.txt echo "dai-billing-${VERSION}" > /var/www/html/scrum2/billdb.txt
